articles.author: The Canadian Press
articles.title: The Latest: Blood sample study: Virus in US by December 2019 - Delta-Optimist
articles.description: NEW YORK — A new analysis of blood samples from 24,000 Americans taken in early 2020 is the latest and largest study to suggest the coronavirus arrived in the U.S. in December 2019. That’s weeks before cases were first recognized by health officials.
articles.content:
